    • Method Detail

      • doAuth

        protected abstract void doAuth(PreparedRequest request,
                               TokenInfo tokenInfo)
        Use token to perform the request authorization. Implementers must call preparedRequest#send() at the end.
        Parameters:
        request - request to be authorized
        tokenInfo - token information retrieved from OAuth login

      • withScopeDelimiter

        public OAuth2Base withScopeDelimiter(String delimiter)

      • auth

        public void auth(PreparedRequest preparedRequest,
                 RequestDispatcher dispatcher)
        Description copied from interface: Auth
        Performs the logic for making the request authenticated, then dispatch the request.

        IMPORTANT: You must call requestOrder#send() after the auth has finished in order to dispatch the request, otherwise the request will never be sent.
        The request can be sent only once.
        Specified by:
        auth in interface Auth
        Parameters:
        preparedRequest - The request about to be sent
